title: Reset Password
subject: Reset Password - CA Well Services, LLC

paragraphs.text: You have requested password reset from the CA Well Services portal.
Please click on the button below to set your new password.

title: User Invitation - CA Well Services, LLC
subject: Customer Login portal - CA Well Services, LLC

paragraphs.text: You have been invited to create your user in CA Well Services Customer Portal.
Click the button bellow to confirm your email and set your password.

title: Invoice - CA Well Services, LLC
subject: New Invoice from CA Well Services, LLC

paragraphs.text: A new invoice from CA Well Services has been issued. The invoice and related field tickets are attached to this email.

title: Ticket - CA Well Services, LLC
subject: New Ticket from CA Well Services, LLC

paragraphs.text: There is a new ticket from CA Well Services.
You can sign the ticket and send it by email to corey@cawellservices.com.
If you have a login in CA Well Services Web application, you can sign the ticket online or upload a signed ticket by clicking the button below.
